data.prayer: God, guide the 7,608 believers in Providenciales and West Caicos to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Providenciales and West Caicos to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 7,608 believers living in Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
Lord, let it be said of the 16,192 lost in Providenciales and West Caicos that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.focus_label: Providenciales and West Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
